/.title: JSON Formatter / Prettifier
/.description: Beautify, validate, and format your JSON data instantly. Free online tool with no registration required.

/json-validator.title: JSON Validator
/json-validator.description: Validate your JSON data instantly. Check for syntax errors and ensure your JSON is properly formatted.

/json-parser.title: JSON Parser
/json-parser.description: Parse and visualize your JSON data. View the structure and hierarchy of your JSON objects.

/json-minifier.title: JSON Minifier
/json-minifier.description: Minify your JSON data by removing unnecessary whitespace. Reduce file size while maintaining functionality.
